Author: hammerprice
Text: I think it’s a good idea to discuss it with her, but I’d be wary of rushing straight in to the assumption that she’s doing it to lose weight. Since she’s a competitive dancer she may just be trying to keep an eye on her macros and such and if she feels like she’s being accused of something else she may not be receptive. But I think you’re right to be concerned and to look for an opportunity to discuss it, especially if you notice other red flags.

Author: ifiwastodie
Text: yeah i would say jus mention how its really great to get into a habit of knowing what you eat, but that it can very easily become an obsession. good luck :)
